name: PushON
overview:
PushON are an award-winning online marketing agency based in Manchester, with clients throughout the UK.

We are an honest, dedicated, and highly professional team of specialists in:

  • Search engine optimisation (SEO)
  • Pay-per-click (PPC)
  • Search engine marketing (SEM)
  • Social media strategies
  • Email marketing campaigns
  • Blog strategies
  • Online public relations/reputation management
  • Online marketing consultancy

We listen to our clients’ requirements and then deploy a wide range of online techniques to work towards achieving their desired results. Whether you wish to generate leads and drive sales on your website, need a site overhaul or simply wish to increase brand awareness, our approach is ethical and uncomplicated.

If you need help to build awareness and enhance your site, we can provide this, but if you’d prefer us to take the stress away and manage all aspects of your site, we’re happy to oblige. We believe your website should bring a measurable return on investment for your business, so we make sure that happens.

PushON have serviced clients across sectors as diverse as public relations and manufacturing, successfully marketing everything from museums to wallpaper. We have achieved high levels of success for our clients in both the public and private sectors.

We are active members of Manchester Digital, the trade body for the digital industry in Manchester and across the North West. Simon Wharton, Managing Director of PushON, has for several years driven initiatives aimed at promoting website accessibility and excellence in online marketing. PushON is wholly owned by Simon Wharton and Roy Wilding, Creative Director. They set up PushON Ltd in 2006 following a successful five-year-long business venture selling VISP (virtual ISP) solutions under the brand name VirtuAffinity Ltd. Since that time, PushON has risen to prominence as one of the North West’s premier online marketing agencies.
